io.github.kensuke1984.kibrary.datacorrection

クラス SCARDEC

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.kensuke1984.kibrary.datacorrection.SCARDEC

  • public class SCARDEC
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is IMMUTABLE.

    Information of a seismic event in SCARDEC. The database is as of 20161115.

    関連項目:
    SCARDEC, NEIC

    • ネストされたクラスのサマリー

      ID for information

      Prints out all the events in the catalog.

    • メソッドの詳細

      • printList

        public static void printList()
        Prints out all the events in the catalog.

      • getSCARDEC

        public static SCARDEC getSCARDEC(SCARDEC.SCARDEC_ID id)

      • search

        public static java.util.Set<SCARDEC.SCARDEC_ID> search(java.util.function.Predicate<SCARDEC.SCARDEC_ID> predicate)
        パラメータ:
        predicate - Filter for IDs
        戻り値:
        Set of IDs in the cache

      • pick

        public static SCARDEC.SCARDEC_ID pick(java.util.function.Predicate<SCARDEC.SCARDEC_ID> predicate)
        Choose one ID from candidates satisfying the predicate.
        パラメータ:
        predicate - filter for IDs
        戻り値:
        SCARDEC_ID chosen from IDs satisfying the predicate.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        パラメータ:
        args - -l for all the list. If ID(yyyyMMdd_HHmmss)s put, it shows their information.

      • readAscii

        public static SCARDEC readAscii(java.nio.file.Path averagePath,
                                java.nio.file.Path optimalPath)
                         throws java.io.IOException
        パラメータ:
        averagePath - a PATH for a SCARDEC file of the average STF (moy)
        optimalPath - a PATH for a SCARDEC file of the optimal STF (opt)
        戻り値:
        SCARDEC written in the input paths
        例外:
        java.io.IOException - if any

      • readBinary

        public static SCARDEC readBinary(java.nio.file.Path averagePath,
                                 java.nio.file.Path optimalPath,
                                 java.nio.file.OpenOption... options)
                          throws java.io.IOException
        例外:
        java.io.IOException

      • getOriginTime

        public java.time.LocalDateTime getOriginTime()
        戻り値:
        origin time

      • getRegion

        public java.lang.String getRegion()
        戻り値:
        String of the region

      • getOptimalSTF

        public SourceTimeFunction getOptimalSTF(int np,
                                        double tlen)
        Interpolate to the samplingHz 20. and creates SourceTimeFunction
        パラメータ:
        np - steps of frequency [should be same as synthetics].
        tlen - [s] length of waveform [should be same as synthetics]
        戻り値:
        SourceTimeFunction for this.

      • getAverageSTF

        public SourceTimeFunction getAverageSTF(int np,
                                        double tlen)
        Interpolate to the samplingHz 20. and creates SourceTimeFunction
        パラメータ:
        np - steps of frequency [should be same as synthetics].
        tlen - [s] length of waveform [should be same as synthetics]
        戻り値:
        SourceTimeFunction for this.

      • write

        public void write(java.nio.file.Path folder,
                  java.nio.file.OpenOption... options)
           throws java.io.IOException
        Outputs the SCARDEC information in the binary format.
        パラメータ:
        folder - Path of the folder where SCARDEC files are written.
        options - if any
        例外:
        java.io.IOException - if any

      • printInfo

        public void printInfo()
        Prints out the origin time, epicentral location, M0, Mw, strikes, dips and rakes.

      • printMomentRate

        public void printMomentRate()
        Prints out moment rate function in the format "time[s] moment rate[N·m/s]"
